name: Gyro Gents
description:
Take to the skies in this aerial sports game. Pilot your gyrocopter while whacking massive croquet balls at the dandy devils you call friends. Has AI to play solo, but can also seat up to four players.


----Update History-----

v1.10, 9/05/16: Added Mac and Linux support. Drastically improved AI. Tweaked level design of second and third levels to make them more playable. Lowered score to win to 3 for shorter match length.

v1.01, 8/29/16: This is the original Ludum Dare build made for LD36. Only available for Windows.
